rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {BTB2220, BTC2210, BTF2220, BTG2220, BTW2220}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 21, 41, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {BTC1110, BTF1010, BTP1010} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: Topics include the separate legal entity status of companies and the concept of limited liability; the effect of registration; the corporate constitution; the company's relationship with outsiders; corporate management incorporating extensive consideration of directors' duties; share capital; regulation of public fund raising; members' remedies incorporating statutory remedies and common law rights of action; members' meetings; forms of corporate insolvency administrations.
